mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.jiaolian_name as jiaolianName ,a.jiaolian_phone as jiaolianPhone ,a.jiaolian_id_number as jiaolianIdNumber ,a.jiaolian_photo as jiaolianPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.jiaolian_email as jiaolianEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jiaolian a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.jiaolian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianName},'%')
and a.jiaolian_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianPhone},'%')
and a.jiaolian_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.jiaolian_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
